00040 namespace network {
00041   namespace broadcaster {
00042     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     // data_connection
00044     //  * buffered data stream
00045     //  * all replys and requests are terminated by "\r\n"
00046     //  * protocol:
00047     //     - "LIST" : list directory of available streams
00048     //     - "GET [stream_name]" : get 'stream_name', from then on data will be sent
00049     //  * when (binary) data is being sent, a "tick" protocol ensures that the
00050     //    connection is still there
00051 
00052     class data_connection : private boost::noncopyable {
00053     public:
00054       typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00055       typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00056   
00057       typedef boost::shared_ptr<data_connection> sptr;
00058       typedef boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket> tcp_socket_ptr;
00059       typedef std::string data_type;
00060       typedef boost::shared_ptr<data_type> data_ptr;
00061       typedef std::pair<ptime, data_ptr> ptime_data_pair;
00062       typedef std::deque<ptime_data_pair> list_of_packets;
00063   
00064       enum status_type {
00065         status_error      = -1, //
00066         status_init       =  0, // negotiation phase: client asks for streams
00067         status_configured =  1  // after streams have been selected, data is sent to the client
00068       } status;
00069   
00070       typedef std::map<std::string, data_type> path_preamble_map_type;
00071     public:
00072       data_connection(boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
00073                       boost::asio::strand& strand,
00074                       tcp_socket_ptr tcp_socket_ptr,
00075                       const broadcaster::directory& directory,
00076                       size_t max_total_size,
00077                       time_duration max_queue_delay)
00078         : io_service_(io_service)
00079         , strand_(strand)
00080         , tcp_socket_ptr_(tcp_socket_ptr)
00081         , directory_(directory)
00082         , max_total_size_(max_total_size)
00083         , max_queue_delay_(max_queue_delay)
00084         , max_delay_(boost::posix_time::seconds(0))
00085         , last_tick_time_(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time())
00086         , status_(status_init)
00087         , start_async_write_(false) {
00088         async_receive_command();
00089       }
00090   
00091       ~data_connection() {
00092         close();
00093       }
00094   
00095       std::string stream_name() const {
00096         if (status_ == status_configured) {
00097           std::ostringstream oss;
00098           BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::regex& r, stream_names_)
00099             oss << r << " ";
00100           return oss.str();    
00101         }
00102         return ((status_ == status_init) ? "[INIT]" : "[ERROR]");
00103       }
00104   
00105       static sptr make(boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
00106                        boost::asio::strand& strand,
00107                        tcp_socket_ptr p,
00108                        const broadcaster::directory& directory,
00109                        size_t max_total_size=40*1024*1024,
00110                        time_duration max_queue_delay=boost::posix_time::minutes(5)) {
00111         return sptr(new data_connection(io_service, strand, p, directory, max_total_size, max_queue_delay));
00112       }
00113   
00114       // close() must ONLY be called in the destructor
00115       // for all other purposes set status_= status_error 
00116       // then the object connection will be deleted in the next call to broadcaster::push_back
00117       void close() {
00118         if (is_open()) {
00119           boost::system::error_code ec;      
00120           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("data_connection::close ep=%s") % tcp_socket_ptr_->remote_endpoint(ec)));
00121           LOG_INFO("close and shutdown socket");
00122           tcp_socket_ptr_->shutdown(boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_send, ec);
00123           if (ec) LOG_WARNING((str(boost::format("shutdown error_code=%s") % ec)));
00124           tcp_socket_ptr_->close();
00125         }
00126       }
00127       bool is_open() const { return tcp_socket_ptr_ ? tcp_socket_ptr_->is_open() : false; }
00128 
00129       void pop_front() { list_of_packets_.pop_front(); }
00130       void pop_back()  { list_of_packets_.pop_back(); }
00131 
00132       list_of_packets::const_reference front() const { return list_of_packets_.front(); }
00133       list_of_packets::const_reference back() const { return list_of_packets_.back(); }
00134 
00135       bool   empty() const { return list_of_packets_.empty(); }
00136       size_t size()  const { return list_of_packets_.size(); }
00137 
00138       size_t total_size() const {
00139         size_t sum(0);
00140         BOOST_FOREACH(const list_of_packets::value_type& lp, list_of_packets_)
00141           sum += lp.second->size();
00142         return sum;
00143       }
00144 
00145       boost::asio::ip::tcp::endpoint local_endpoint(boost::system::error_code& ec) const {
00146         return tcp_socket_ptr_->local_endpoint(ec);
00147       }
00148       boost::asio::ip::tcp::endpoint remote_endpoint(boost::system::error_code& ec) const {
00149         return tcp_socket_ptr_->remote_endpoint(ec);
00150       }
00151 
00152       time_duration delay(ptime t) const {
00153         return (empty()) ? boost::posix_time::seconds(0) : t - front().first;
00154       }
00155 
00156       time_duration max_delay() const { return max_delay_; }
00157       void reset_max_delay() { max_delay_ = boost::posix_time::seconds(0); }
00158       double max_delay_msec() const {
00159         return 1e3*max_delay().ticks() / time_duration::ticks_per_second();
00160       }
00161   
00162       ptime last_tick_time() const { return last_tick_time_; }
00163 
00164       bool match_path(std::string path) const {
00165         BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::regex& r, stream_names_)
00166           if (regex_match(path, r)) return true;
00167         return false;
00168       }
00169   
00170       bool check_format(data_ptr d) const {
00171         if (not d) return true;
00172         const protocol::header* hp(reinterpret_cast<const protocol::header*>(&(*d)[0]));
00173         return (sizeof(protocol::header)+hp->length() == d->size());
00174       }
00175       data_type strip_header(data_ptr d) const {
00176         assert(d->size() >= sizeof(protocol::header));
00177         return data_type(d->begin()+sizeof(protocol::header), d->end());
00178       }
00179 
00180       bool push_back(ptime t,
00181                      std::string path,
00182                      data_ptr data,
00183                      data_ptr preamble) {
00184         if (status_ == status_init)  return true;
00185 
00186         //     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("push_back path=%s dt=%.3f sec (%s %s)")
00187         //                  % path
00188         //                  % (1e-3*dt.total_milliseconds())
00189         //                  % boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(t)
00190         //                  % boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(last_tick_time())));
00191 
00192         // check if the client is still alive
00193         const boost::posix_time::time_duration dt(t - last_tick_time());
00194         if (dt > boost::posix_time::minutes(5)) {
00195           LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("time since last tick %s > 5 minutes") % dt));
00196           status_ = status_error;
00197         }
00198 
00199         if (status_ == status_error) return false;
00200 
00201         // path="" is always broadcasted
00202         if (path != "" && !match_path(path))
00203           return true;
00204 
00205         // pedantic checks
00206         assert(check_format(data) == true);
00207         assert(check_format(preamble) == true);
00208 
00209         max_delay_ = std::max(max_delay_, delay(t));
00210 
00211         // if the buffer is full forget all data except first packets which may be being sent
00212         size_t n_omit(0);
00213         if (not empty() && (total_size() > max_total_size_ || front().first+max_queue_delay_ < t)) {
00214           for (; size()>1; ++n_omit)      
00215             list_of_packets_.pop_back();
00216         }
00217         if (n_omit != 0)
00218           LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("omitted # %d data packets") % n_omit));
00219 
00220         if (is_open()) {
00221           const bool list_was_empty(empty());
00222           if (preamble) {
00223             const data_type preamble_without_header(strip_header(preamble));
00224             data_type& old_preamble_without_header(path_preamble_without_header_map_[path]);
00225             if (preamble_without_header != old_preamble_without_header) {
00226               old_preamble_without_header = preamble_without_header;
00227               list_of_packets_.push_back(std::make_pair(t, preamble));
00228             }
00229           }
00230           list_of_packets_.push_back(std::make_pair(t, data));
00231           if (list_was_empty || start_async_write_) {
00232             start_async_write_= false;
00233             async_write_data();
00234           }
00235           return true;
00236         }
00237         return false;
00238       }
00239 
00240       void async_write_data() {
00241         if (!empty() && is_open()) {
00242           data_ptr dataPtr(front().second);
00243           const protocol::header* hp((const protocol::header*)dataPtr->data());
00244           if (hp->length() != dataPtr->size() - sizeof(protocol::header)) {
00245             LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("ERROR: %d!=%d (%s)") % hp->length() % (dataPtr->size() - sizeof(protocol::header)) % (*hp)));
00246           }
00247           boost::asio::async_write(*tcp_socket_ptr_,
00248                                    boost::asio::buffer(dataPtr->data(), dataPtr->size()),
00249                                    strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&data_connection::handle_write_data,
00250                                                             this,
00251                                                             boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00252                                                             boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred)));
00253         }
00254       }
00255 
00256       void handle_write_data(const boost::system::error_code& ec,
00257                              std::size_t bytes_transferred) {
00258         if (ec) {
00259           LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("handle_write_data ec=%s %d") % ec.message() % bytes_transferred));
00260           status_= status_error; // -> close();
00261         } else if (is_open()) {
00262           pop_front();
00263           async_write_data();
00264         }
00265       }
00266 
00267       void async_receive_command() {
00268         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("async_receive_command status=%d") % status_));
00269         switch (status_) {
00270         case status_init:
00271           boost::asio::async_read_until(*tcp_socket_ptr_, response_, "\r\n",
00272                                         strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&data_connection::handle_receive_command,
00273                                                                  this,
00274                                                                  boost::asio::placeholders::error)));
00275           break;
00276         case status_configured:
00277           break;
00278         default:
00279           // this should never happen
00280           ;
00281         }
00282       }
00283 
00284       void handle_receive_command(const boost::system::error_code& ec) {
00285         if (ec) {
00286           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command ec=%s") % ec));
00287           status_= status_error; // -> close();
00288           return;
00289         }
00290         std::istream response_stream(&response_);
00291         std::string action;
00292         if (response_stream >> action) {
00293           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command action='%s'") % action));
00294           if (action == "LIST") {
00295             // send list of available streams        
00296             send_reply(directory_.ls(), status_);
00297           } else if (action == "GET") {
00298             std::string stream_name;
00299             while (response_stream >> stream_name) {          
00300               LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command requested stream name='%s'") % stream_name));
00301               boost::regex stream_regex;
00302               try { // stream_name may not be a proper reguar expression
00303                 stream_regex = boost::regex(stream_name);
00304               } catch (const boost::regex_error& e) {
00305                 LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command: invalid regex '%s'") % stream_name));
00306                 send_reply(str(boost::format("ERROR: invalid regex '%s'") % stream_name), status_);
00307                 return;
00308               }
00309               if (directory_.contains(stream_regex)) {
00310                 stream_names_.insert(stream_regex);
00311                 LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command successfully requested stream name='%s'")
00312                              % stream_name));
00313               } else { // stream not available
00314                 LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("handle_receive_command: stream '%s' is not available") % stream_name));
00315                 send_reply(str(boost::format("ERROR stream '%s' is not available aborting") % stream_name), status_);
00316                 break;
00317               }
00318             }
00319             if (stream_names_.empty()) {
00320               LOG_ERROR("handle_receive_command: no stream name given");
00321               send_reply("ERROR: no stream name given", status_);
00322               return;
00323             }
00324             send_reply("OK", status_configured);
00325           } else { // action != {LIST,GET}
00326             LOG_ERROR("handle_receive_command: action != {LIST,GET}");
00327             send_reply("ERROR: action != {LIST,GET}", status_);
00328           }
00329         } else { // no action
00330           LOG_ERROR("handle_receive_command: no action");
00331           // send_reply("ERROR: no action", status_);
00332           async_receive_command();
00333         }
00334       }
00335 
00336       void send_reply(std::string reply, status_type new_status) {
00337         reply_= reply+"\r\n";
00338         boost::asio::async_write(*tcp_socket_ptr_,
00339                                  boost::asio::buffer(reply_),
00340                                  strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&data_connection::handle_write_reply,
00341                                                           this,
00342                                                           new_status,
00343                                                           boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00344                                                           boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred)));
00345       }
00346 
00347       void handle_write_reply(status_type new_status,
00348                               boost::system::error_code ec,
00349                               std::size_t bytes_transferred) {
00350         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_write_reply: ec='%s' bytes_transferred=%d new_status=%d")
00351                      % ec % bytes_transferred % new_status));
00352         if (ec) {
00353           async_receive_command();
00354         } else {
00355           // this is tricky: if we do not wait long enough
00356           // the client will receive more data than expected in async_read_until:
00357           // therefore the status is updated only after the first tick has been received
00358           if (new_status == status_configured) {
00359             // make sure that first the current directory is broadcasted
00360             const ptime now(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time());
00361             const data_type data(directory_.serialize(now));
00362             const protocol::header h(broadcaster::directory::id(), now, 0, data.size());
00363             //         data_ptr bytes(new std::string);
00364             //         std::copy(h.begin(),    h.end(),    std::back_inserter(*bytes));
00365             //         std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), std::back_inserter(*bytes));
00366             data_ptr bytes(new std::string(sizeof(protocol::header)+data.size(), 0));
00367             std::copy(h.begin(),    h.end(),    bytes->begin());
00368             std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), bytes->begin()+sizeof(protocol::header));
00369             list_of_packets_.push_back(std::make_pair(now, bytes));
00370             start_async_write_ = true; // this makes push_back start async_write with non-empty queue
00371             async_receive_tick(new_status);
00372           }
00373           else
00374             async_receive_command();
00375         }
00376       }
00377 
00378       void async_receive_tick(status_type status=status_configured) {
00379         if (is_open())
00380           boost::asio::async_read(*tcp_socket_ptr_,
00381                                   boost::asio::buffer(&dummy_data_, sizeof(dummy_data_)),
00382                                   strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&data_connection::handle_receive_tick,
00383                                                            this,
00384                                                            boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00385                                                            boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred,
00386                                                            status)));
00387       }
00388       void handle_receive_tick(const boost::system::error_code& ec,
00389                                std::size_t bytes_transferred,
00390                                status_type new_status) {
00391         if (ec) {
00392           boost::system::error_code ec2;
00393           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("handle_receive_tick ep=%s ec=%s") % tcp_socket_ptr_->remote_endpoint(ec2) % ec));
00394           status_= status_error; // -> close();
00395         } else {
00396           status_= new_status;
00397           last_tick_time_ = boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time();
00398           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("tick %d '%c' %d") % bytes_transferred % dummy_data_ % status_));
00399           async_receive_tick();
00400         }
00401       }
00402     protected:
00403     private:
00404       boost::asio::io_service& io_service_;
00405       boost::asio::strand&     strand_;
00406       boost::asio::streambuf   response_;
00407       std::string              reply_;
00408       tcp_socket_ptr           tcp_socket_ptr_;
00409       const broadcaster::directory& directory_;
00410       const size_t             max_total_size_;
00411       const time_duration      max_queue_delay_;
00412       time_duration            max_delay_;
00413       list_of_packets          list_of_packets_;
00414       path_preamble_map_type   path_preamble_without_header_map_;
00415       char                     dummy_data_;
00416       ptime                    last_tick_time_;
00417       std::set<boost::regex>   stream_names_;
00418       status_type              status_;
00419       bool                     start_async_write_;
00420     } ;
